overview:
David Buechner, VP of Business Development, at Impulse Accelerated Technologies, Kirkland Washington. Previously David was Vice President of Sales for Danaher Corporation (Fluke Networks) and for Harris Corporation Network Support Division, where he managed a worldwide sales team of 80, managed 600 independent representatives and generated annual revenues of $120M. Mr. Buechner has 20 years of experience in executive sales management and marketing of industry-leading products to Fortune 50 customers.

Mr. Buechner holds two Masters including a MA from Holy Names University where he was awarded National Honors, and a BA from Calvin College.
